values: Turning Sadness at Losing Money to Gladness at Gaining JesusTurning Sadness at Losing Money to Gladness at Gaining Jesus

A camel cannot pass through the eye of a needle, nor can we turn our own hearts from loving money to loving Jesus. But what is impossible with man is possible with God.A camel cannot pass through the eye of a needle, nor can we turn our own hearts from loving money to loving Jesus. But what is impossible with man is possible with God.
